import React from 'react'; import '../../resources/templates.css' function Template1() { const user= JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("shaikhresume-user")); return (

{user.firstName.toUpperCase()} {user.lastName.toUpperCase()}

{user.Email}

{user.address}

{user.mobilenum}

objective

{/*

) } export default Template1
